NomaiObject:
<color=orange>Excavation Site</color> Clue: There is another QM locator on BH and you can learn to use the rule of imaging from afar there?
1
SOLANUM: Ilex, I apologize for the wait! I did not think you would reach <color=lightblue>Ember Twin</color> so quickly.
2
1
ILEX: Of course! I did not wish to risk being late for your pilgrimage today, my friend.
3 2
ILEX: Still, I believe I could have simply visited the new <color=orange>Quantum Moon Locator</color> on <color=lightblue>Brittle Hollow</color> to support your pilgrimage.
4
3
SOLANUM: Wait.. There was a second <color=orange>Quantum Moon Locator</color> built on <color=lightblue>Brittle Hollow?</color> This is the first time I have heard of it!
5
4
ILEX: There is. I was curious why you did not use this newer locator - especially when it is able to track when the <color=lightblue>Quantum Moon</color> visits the sixth location, unlike this locator!
6
5
SOLANUM: That sounds quite curious! I wonder why Bells never mentioned this locator to me.. Would it have made the pilgrimage too simple?
7
6
SOLANUM: I shall be returning to <color=lightblue>Brittle Hollow</color> shortly to begin my expedition.
8
7
SOLANUM: If time allows, I shall try to find this second <color=orange>Quantum Moon Locator</color> on <color=lightblue>Brittle Hollow</color> to learn its secrets!
BH_QML R1 4
R_SLR R3 5
BH_QML R3 5
